description: WebScraping AI is a powerful tool that allows you to scrape websites and extract data.

actions.name: askAQuestionAboutTheWebPage
actions.display_name: Ask a Question About the Web Page
actions.description: Gets an answer to a question about a given webpage.

actions.name: extractStructuredData
actions.description: Returns structured data fields extracted from the webpage using an LLM model.

actions.name: getAccountInformation
actions.description: Get account usage information including remaining API credits and concurrent requests.

actions.name: getPageHtml
actions.description: Retrieves the raw HTML markup of a web page.

actions.name: scrapeWebsiteText
actions.description: Returns the visible text content of a webpage specified by the URL.
